Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioRenderer.ChannelVolume

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioRenderer.ChannelVolume
  • Enclosing class:
    AudioRenderer

    public static class AudioRenderer.ChannelVolume
extends Object
    Specifies the volume of audio channels.

    This class specifies the volume for the left and right audio channels to play pulse-code modulation (PCM) streams.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO
